title: geth-1.10.20 how to config "The Merge" to connect mainnet ?
body:

and start geth like this:

The merge for Mainnet is not decided/enabled yet. You don't need to config anything at this moment.

You can dump the p2p logs via `--vmodule "p2p=5"` to see the reason behind the failed connection.
@kai-zhong Do you have unclean shutdown? What's your command for setup?

`geth snapshot verify-state --datadir /var/lib/ethereum --datadir.ancient /mnt/ethereum/ancient`
